definition: a distinctive but intangible quality surrounding a person or thing
details:
noun
- a distinctive but intangible quality surrounding a person or thing
= synonyms: air
- the mass of air surrounding the Earth
= example: the mass of air surrounding the Earth
= synonyms: air
- the envelope of gases surrounding any celestial body
- a unit of pressure: the pressure that will support a column of mercury 760 mm high at sea level and 0 degrees centigrade
= synonyms: standard atmosphere, standard pressure
- the weather or climate at some place
= example: the weather or climate at some place
= synonyms: atmospheric state
- a particular environment or surrounding influence
= example: a particular environment or surrounding influence
= synonyms: ambiance, ambience
